Hero.subtitle: Keep operations running. Hit your targets.
Hero.title:
For the Plant Manager
Who Wants to Lead with
Confidence
Hero.description: Make smarter decisions, faster. Tractian gives you clarity, control, and confidence — so you can lead the plant and prove the ROI.

WhyChoose.subtitle: Why Plant Managers Choose Tractian
WhyChoose.title: Run a tighter ship without extra burden

items.title: Prove the ROI, not just the effort
items.description: Stop debating maintenance investments. Tractian gives you real numbers tied to real results — failures prevented, hours saved, resources optimized. It’s the kind of data that makes budget conversations easier.

items.title: Get ahead of downtime before it escalates
items.description: See the earliest signs of failure and take action before it snowballs into a crisis. Tractian helps your team move from reactive firefighting to proactive planning — with fewer surprises and fewer urgent calls.

items.title: Run a leaner, more effective team
items.description: Labor is tight, training takes time, and turnover hurts. Tractian gives your existing team intuitive, powerful tools that help them improve skills, solve problems faster, follow plans clearly, and deliver more every shift.

items.title: Keep audits simple, compliance covered
items.description: Tractian helps standardize processes, organize maintenance records, and generate reliable reports — making audits easier, reducing risk, and turning compliance into part of daily operations.

HowItWorks.title: Built for smarter oversight and real results

items.contentTitle: Show what’s working with reports built for leadership visibility.
items.description: Tractian tracks the metrics that matter - from downtime trends to execution rates - so you can prove value at every review.
listItem: Monitor backlog, downtime, maintenance costs, and financial planning
Export data for audits, reports, and budget justification
Use filters by area, asset, failure type, or timeframe
Make better decisions based on real performance trends

items.contentTitle: Run the plant with clarity and control.
items.description: Standardize maintenance procedures, reduce safety risks, and always stay ready for audits. With Tractian, compliance is no longer a side process - it’s built into your team’s daily execution.
listItem: SOPs and work permits attached directly to work orders and inspections
Track safety-related tasks, validations, and overdue actions
Ensure repeatability and accountability across teams and shifts
Automatic reports of what was done, when, and by whom
Instantly export task logs and records for audits and compliance reviews

items.contentTitle: Standardize maintenance and reliability efforts across multiple facilities without increasing complexity.
items.description: Manage and compare asset and team performance in one place.
listItem: Track KPIs across plants or business units
Unify processes, alerts, and planning under a single platform
Benchmark efficiency and uptime between sites
Apply learnings from one facility to others quickly

items.contentTitle: Get ahead of workload imbalances and ensure your staff is focused where it matters most.
listItem: Visualize each technician or team’s workload to avoid gaps or overloaded teams
Flag gaps or bottlenecks in your planning
Reduce stress and improve results by aligning preventive tasks with real priorities
Automate scheduling to keep things moving

YouControl.title: You run the plant. We’ve got your back.

items.title: Built for the whole plant
items.description: Get everyone on the same page - no more silos or scattered systems. Our solutions help you track maintenance, reliability, and execution in one place so your team moves faster.

items.title: Execution-ready from day one
items.description: Skip the lengthy training and slow ramp-up. With tools your team actually uses, you’ll see impact quickly - without needing extra headcount, expensive consultants, or complex rollouts.

items.title: White-glove support
items.description: Our expert team works shoulder-to-shoulder with you, from install to scale-up. With hands-on support, we’re on site when it matters - helping you train teams, fine-tune setups, and hit your goals faster.

Testimonials.title: Hear it from the people who use it every day

items.name: Paul M.
items.quote: With everything centralized within Tractian platform, we finally have the visibility to act fast, plan smarter, and show real results.

items.name: Nicholas D.
items.quote: I like that I can track all of our assets from one location. If a motor is having issues in one part of the plant, and another on the other side of the plant, I am able to basically troubleshoot both motors from the same place.

items.name: Fabiano J.
items.quote: Now when I get to the plant, I just log in and everything I need is right there - step-by-step instructions, what I need to do. It’s a lot easier, way faster, and less of a hassle.

items.name: Andy B.
items.role: Head of Manufacturing and Supply Chain
items.quote: Nothing was too much trouble for them, and they went to the 'nth' degree to understand Lyka's business and asset care short & long-term strategic plan. This level of seeking to understand made the implementation particularly user friendly.

TrustedBy: Trusted by hundreds of leaders from U.S. and global manufacturers

StepByStep.title: From first call to full rollout - we’ve got you covered

items.title: We’ll get to know your plant
items.description: Schedule a quick call so we can understand your processes, challenges, and team structure. We’ll walk you through how Tractian fits into your day-to-day and highlight where you’ll see the fastest wins and ROI.

items.title: We’ll deliver a tailored demo
items.description: Bring in your key stakeholders for a hands-on demo aligned with your priorities. We’ll share relevant use cases from similar operations and show exactly how your team can benefit.

items.title: We’ll build a business case and ROI analysis
items.description: We’ll outline ROI projections and cost justification based on your goals. Meanwhile, our engineers will ensure seamless connectivity, security, and integration with your current systems.

items.title: We’ll deploy, train, and go live
items.description: Our engineers will roll out Tractian to your team with white-glove support, field training, and no disruption to operations. From day one, you’ll start tracking value and scaling adoption without friction.

CTA.title:
More Than Machines.
It's About People.

questions.question: How can I reduce unplanned downtime at my plant?
questions.answer: Tractian condition monitoring detects early-stage failures and sends alerts before breakdowns happen - giving you time to act. Combined with our CMMS, those alerts automatically generate work orders, assign tasks, and track progress, so nothing slips through the cracks. You prevent failures and stay organized while doing it.

questions.question: Can I prove ROI using Tractian?
questions.answer: Tractian is built for industrial assets - from motors and pumps to compressors, gearboxes, and more. If it moves, vibrates, or heats up, we can help you monitor it.

questions.question: How hard is it to install and start using Tractian?
questions.answer: It’s plug-and-play. Vibration sensors are installed in minutes, and our platform is intuitive - no complex onboarding or training required. Most teams are up and running within a day.

questions.question: Can Tractian really help if my team is understaffed?
questions.answer: Yes. Our condition monitoring pinpoints the issues, while the CMMS turns them into clear, actionable tasks. Together, they eliminate time spent digging through data, guessing priorities, or chasing paperwork. You get straight-to-the-point alerts, smart scheduling, and full visibility so your team can act fast - even with fewer hands.

questions.question: Do I need to replace my current systems to use Tractian?
questions.answer: No. Tractian is designed to work alongside your existing tools, including ERPs, maintenance systems, and spreadsheets. You can start where you are and scale without disruption.

questions.question: How does Tractian support compliance and audit preparation?
questions.answer: Tractian builds compliance into everyday maintenance. It tracks safety validations, work permits, SOPs, and historical logs in one place - so you can instantly export reports and prove due diligence during audits or inspections.

questions.question: What kind of reporting does Tractian offer?
questions.answer: Tractian offers leadership-ready insights, including maintenance costs, backlog, execution rates, asset health, and labor productivity. Reports can be customized by area, timeframe, or asset type - and exported for planning or presentations.

questions.question: Is Tractian easy for technicians to use?
questions.answer: Yes. Tractian is mobile-first and built for the field. Tasks, checklists, and diagnostics are available in just a few taps - helping your team execute work orders, validate fixes, and stay productive without extra admin.

questions.question: What kind of support is included with Tractian?
questions.answer: You’ll get full onboarding support, a dedicated account manager, and full access to our CAT-certified engineering team. Whether it’s training, integration, or strategy, we’re with you every step of the way.

questions.question: Can I use Tractian across multiple sites?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Tractian supports multi-site visibility out of the box. You can monitor performance across facilities, compare results, and standardize processes at scale.

questions.question: What types of machines or equipment does Tractian work with?
questions.answer: Tractian is designed to support a wide range of critical equipment - from motors and pumps to compressors and other industrial assets - whether they’re modern or aging.

questions.question: Does Tractian require Wi-Fi or internal networks?
questions.answer: Tractian sensors use independent connectivity, so there’s no need for internal network access or complex IT setup. Your data syncs automatically to our secure cloud platform. You can access the software from any desktop with internet access, or use the mobile app - even offline - right from the plant floor.

questions.question: Can Tractian help with standardizing processes across teams?
questions.answer: Tractian offers leadership-ready insights, including maintenance costs, backlog, execution rates, asset health, and labor productivity. Reports can be customized by area, timeframe, or asset type - and exported for planning or presentations.

questions.question: Can I migrate my existing maintenance data?
questions.answer: Yes. We provide easy data migration tools and hands-on support to bring in your historical records from Excel, ERP, CMMS, or other systems. You won’t lose your legacy data.

questions.question: Does Tractian integrate with my existing tools?
questions.answer: Yes. We offer integrations with ERPs and support custom workflows through our open API. We also provide free migration from your current CMMS, along with easy-to-use tools to import data from Excel or other file formats.

questions.question: Is Tractian secure?
questions.answer: Yes. Tractian is compliant with key security and quality standards, including SOC 2, ISO 27001, and ISO 9001. Our platform supports Single Sign-On (SSO), multi-factor authentication (MFA), and granular role-based access controls to ensure data is protected and only accessible to authorized users. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest.

questions.question: How much does Tractian cost?
questions.answer: For our Bundled plan, combining Condition Monitoring Sensors and Maintenance Management Software, pricing depends on the size and complexity of your operation. We’ll work with you to build a custom quote based on your needs, with no hidden fees. Everything you need is included in one simple, integrated package.

company.name: Tractian
company.description: The complete maintenance and reliability platform for industrial teams.
